actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit

official_title: Congratulating the National Association of Farm Service Agency County Office Employees (NASCOE) on its 50th anniversary and its role in support of American agriculture.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Congratulates the National Association of Farm Service Agency County Office Employees (NASCOE) on its 50th anniversary.

Thanks NASCOE members for their public service to rural America.

titles.title: Congratulating the National Association of Farm Service Agency County Office Employees (NASCOE) on its 50th anniversary and its role in support of American agriculture.
